PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Larger scale Media sofa collection with power headrest, power lumbar, power recline, lay flat mechanisms and 3” footrest extension. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Double power reclining group with power recline and power headrests. Transitional styling is found in the double flared track arms, split pub back, and boxed styled pad over chaise seating with pocketed coil springs. Outside the arm push button controllers with UBS ports for types A and C. Available pieces include sofa, matching loveseat, and matching recliner.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Traditionally styled smaller scale group with articulated power headrest and power recline. Group features winged pub back design, pleated shaped arms, and box seat styled pad over chaise seating with pocketed coil springs encased in foam, wrapped in Dacron with down blend feather toppers. Nail head trim accents the wings, arms, shaped bottom rails, and foot boards. Available pieces: reclining sofa, reclining loveseat and matching recliner. Wood legs are a espresso color. Power buttons have USB port, memory button and auto close button.

Angled ottoman continues the comfort by perfectly positioning your legs. Recliner mechanism adjusts and locks to your desired comfort zone. Heavy duty wood base is finished in a beautiful Cappuccino finish.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Smaller scale 3-way transitional recliner with footrest extension. Attached welted pillow back, shaped track arms, tight welted box seat cushion with pocket coil springs and a down blend feather wrap for plush comfort and lasting durability. The tapered wood legs have a distressed old-world finish.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Classic wing back lounge chair recliner with 3-way push thru the arms mechanism and footrest extension. Chippendale hand carved base is finished in a reddish-brown merlot finish.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Zero gravity power recliner with power headrest and power lumbar. Designed to suspend your body in a neutral posture where your feet are elevated in alignment with your heart. You will experience a weightless sensation, allowing you to deeply relax and release tension. By supporting your body in a weightless and neutral posture, zero gravity helps you to decompress the spine and reduce painful pressure points. In zero gravity position your body is fully supported allowing your to deeply relax and let go of muscle tension.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Zero gravity power recliner with power headrest and power lumbar. Designed to suspend your body in a neutral posture where your feet are elevated in alignment with your heart. You will experience a weightless sensation, allowing you to deeply relax and release tension. In zero gravity position your body is fully supported allowing your to deeply relax and let go of muscle tension.

Heavy duty wood base is finished in a beautiful Cappuccino finish.

COLLECTION: William Pedestal Reclining Chair and Storage Ottoman
DESCRIPTION: William Pedestal Reclining Chair and Storage Ottoman
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: 360-degree swivel reclining pedestal chair and matching storage ottoman.  The chair features oversized head rest area, three sectioned lower back and slightly bucketed seats with pocketed coil springs, two slide back arm pads; one that reveals a cup holder and one that reveals a receptacle for a snack table.  The ergonomically shaped storage ottoman can store the snack table when not in use. The bases are wood with matching upholstery trim.
